definitions.definition: (often in the plural) A fundamental principle or skill, especially in a field of learning.
definitions.example: We'll be learning the rudiments of thermodynamics next week.

definitions.definition: (often in the plural) Something in an undeveloped form.
definitions.example: I have the rudiments of an escape plan.

definitions.definition: A body part that no longer has a function
In percussion, one of a selection of basic drum patterns learned as an exercise.
